Tristan Rogers Bio | Wiki

Tristan Rogers is an Australian-American voiceover artist and actor known for his role on the ABC soap opera, General Hospital as Robert Scorpio. He has also been a cast member of The Rescuers Down Under (1990) and Studio City (2019).

Tristan Rogers Age

He was born in Melbourne, Victoria, in Australia on June 3, 1946. Rogers is 76 years old.

Tristan Rogers Height

He is a man of above-average stature. Rogers’ height is 6 ft 1 in ( approx. 1.85m ).

Tristan Rogers Family

He is a local of Melbourne, Victoria, in Australia. Rogers was raised by his parents in Australia. However, he relocated to the USA after purchasing a house in Palm Springs, California in 1997. Furthermore, his mother passed on in April 2017. However, Rogers has not shared much about his family with the public domain including the identity of his parents or whether he has any siblings.

Tristan Rogers Wife | Married

He got married to his wife Teresa Parkerson on May 21, 1995. Rogers and his wife are proud parents of two children, Sara Jane born in August 1992, and a son by the name of Cale born in August 1996. However, this is not the first time that Rogers has been in a marriage union. He was previously married to his first wife, Barbara Meale between 1974 to 1984. Furthermore, his ex-wife is a well-renowned actress known for her role in Out of Love (1974) and Homicide (1964).

Tristan Rogers Education

Despite being a well-renowned veteran actor, Rogers has withheld his academic qualifications from the public eye due to his secretive character.

Tristan Rogers Emma Samms

Both Rogers and Emma Samms have been the cast members of the General Hospital television series on ABC. Emma is an English actress and TV host who is known for her role in the Dynasty soap opera as Fallon Carrington Colby. After Rogers divorced his first wife Barbara Meale in 1984, he got into a brief relationship with Emma. However, the relationship ended shortly after Emma made her exit from General Hospital.

Tristan Rogers General Hospital

He plays the role of Robert Scorpio in the General Hospital Tv series on ABC. Apart from casting a role in the General hospital, Rogers has also been a cast member of The Young and the Restless, Four Dimensions of Greta (1972), Sex Farm (1973), Soulmates (1992), A Piece of Eden (2000), Jack Rio (2008), The Los Angeles Ripper (2011) Raven (2010), Delgo (2008), The Flesh and Blood Show (1972), Night Eyes 3 (1993), Delgo (2008), The Rescuers Down Under (1990), etc.

Tristan Rogers Health

He has been a professional actor for at least four decades. During his career as an actor, Rogers has not shared any details concerning his health or whether he has any health-related issues. However, in November 2016, he flew to Canada to check on the health of his mother. Unfortunately, Rogers’ mother passed on in April 2017. Additionally, he shared the news of his mother’s demise through a tweet.

Tristan Rogers Net Worth

Rogers’ net worth is $8 million. He has been an actor who has landed lucrative deals in the acting industry for more than four decades. Therefore, it goes undisputed that Rogers has been able to accumulate a decent fortune over the years.

How Old Is Tristan Rogers

He is 76 years old. Rogers was born in Melbourne, Victoria, Australia on June 3, 1946.

Is Tristan Rogers Married

Yes, he has been married to his beautiful wife Teresa Parkerson since May 1995. Furthermore, Rogers and his wife share two all-grown-up children, Cale and Sara Jane. However, Rogers was previously married to actress Barbara Maele between 1974 to 1984.

Who Is Tristan Rogers

He is an Australian-American actor known for his role in the Young and Restless as well as General Hospital. Rogers has also been a cast member of Studio City (2019) and he Rescuers Down Under (1990).

Tristan Rogers is an Australian-American actor, best-known for his role as Robert Scorpio on ABC soap opera General Hospital. He is also popular for voicing Jake in The Rescuers Down Under. Rogers' film credits include Four Dimensions of Greta, Delgo, and Jack Rio among others.

Early Life And Early Career Of Tristan Rogers

Tristan Rogers was born on 3rd June 1946 in Melbourne, Australia. Information about his parents and early childhood is not known to the date. He spent his time in his hometown Melbourne before he moved to the USA to pursue an acting career.

He was interested in acting from an early age and worked in some minor roles on Australian television and soap operas that include Bellbird, Number 96 and The Box. Later, he was cast regular in the police drama series The Link Men that only lasted for 13 episodes in the '70s.

Tristan Rogers' Professional Career

Tristan Rogers moved to the USA in the late 70s and got his career breakthrough there in 1980 when he was cast on General Hospital. He worked on the soap opera for 11 long years until February 1992.

He played the role of Robert Scorpio in the show whose 1981 wedding gained 30 million viewers setting the records for the highest-rated hour in American soap opera history.

In December 2010, Rogers made his comeback in the daytime television joining the cast of The Young and the Restless as Colin Atkinson. His role in the show ended in October 2011, though he signed the contract until February 2011.

On March 1, 2012, Rogers returned to General Hospital as Robert Scorpio after the character Anna Devane called him to tell him that their daughter Robin Scorpio-Drake was killed in a lab accident. He left the show after eight episodes.

Tristan Rogers' Net Worth

Australian born American actor Tristan Rogers has been active in the acting industry for over four decades and in this period, he has worked in a number of big hit movies and television series. As of 2019, his net worth is under review, however, considering his success and fame in the industry, his net worth can be estimated to range from $100k-$1 million.

He primarily earned from his time in the soap opera where he gave the most of his career time. Moreover, he also amassed a lucrative sum of money from sponsors and endorsements.

Tristan Rogers' Personal Life, Marriage, And Children

Talking about Tristan Rogers' personal life, the 73-year-old actor is a happily married man; has been married to Teresa Parkerson since 21st May 1995. The couple is blessed with two children; daughter Sara Jane whom they welcomed on 25th August 1992, and son Cale Rogers (born: August 1996).

Prior to marrying Teresa Parkerson, he was married to his first wife Barbara Meale whom he divorced in 1984 after a decade long married life.

He has been married to Teresa Parkerson since May 21, 1995. They have two children. He was previously married to Barbara Meale.

Born and raised in Australia Tristan Rogers is an Australian-American actor who is best known as Robert Scorpio, his character on ABC soap opera General Hospital. Rogers is also known as a voice actor who voiced Jake in The Rescuers Down Under. Besides, he also worked in the films that included Four Dimensions of Greta, Jack Rio, Delgo among others.

Tristan Rogers' Early Life, Bio, And Early Career

Actor Tristan Rogers was born in Melbourne, Australia on 3rd June 1946. Details about his parents and siblings are not known. Tristan Rogers spent his childhood and teenage in his hometown Melbourne where he also started his early career in acting.

He worked in some minor roles on Australian television and soap opera before he relocated to the United States to flourish his acting career. His work in Australia included Number 96, Bellbird, and The Box. He also worked as a regular cast in the police drama series The Link Men that was shortlived for 13 episodes.

Tristan Rogers' Professional Career

Tristan Rogers emigrated to the United States in the late 70s and tried his luck in some minor roles before he got the break in the future superhit General Hospital. He worked as the Robert Scorpio on the soap opera until February 1992.

The 1981 episode of the show in which featured his character Scorpio's wedding ama s sed 30 million viewers which is the highest-rated hour in American soap opera history. He shared the screen with the actors like Anthony Geary, Jane Elliot, Finola Hughes, Maurice Benard, and Sean Kanan in General Hospital.

CAPTION: Australian-American actor Tristan Rogers SOURCE: General Hospital Wikia - Fandom

Rogers remained out of the daytime television shows before making his comeback as Colin Atkinson in The Young and the Restless. He worked in the show until October 2011; though his contract with the show expired in February that year.

Rogers returned as Roberts Scorpio in General Hospital after Anna Devane, his wife in the show, called him to tell that their daughter Robin Scorpio-Drake was killed in a lab accident. He worked in the series for eight episodes.

Tristan Rogers' Net Worth

The famous Australian-American actor Tristan Rogers has earned a handsome sum of money from his acting career, which is the main source of his income and net worth. In his over 4-decade-long career, he has worked in multiple hit series and movies from which we can say he ama s sed a good amount of money.

His exact net worth is not revealed, however, it might range from $100k-$1 million as of 2019.

Tristan Rogers' Personal Life, Wife, And Children

Actor Rogers is 73 years old as of 2019, and he is a married man. He has been in a happily married life with wife Teresa Parkerson with whom he tied the knot on 21st May 1995. The lovebirds are blessed with two children; daughter Sara Jane; born 25th August 1992, and son Cale Rogers; born August 1996.

Before marrying Parkerson, Rogers was in a marital relationship with his first wife, Barbara Meale. The couple got married in 1974 and got divorced in 1984 without having any children.
